recipe.title: Radicchio and Parsley Salad with Anchovy Dressing
ingredients: 1 large head of radicchio, quartered, cored, sliced lengthwise
instructions: Mix radicchio and parsley in large bowl. Whisk lemon juice, capers, chopped anchovy fillets, and garlic in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Pour dressing over radicchio and parsley; toss to coat. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper.
